overview: "Hazzard Nation" tells the happy story of the t.v. show which was mocked by the critics and despised by the snobs, but became an international sensation and a permanent part of Americana. As "The Dukes of Hazzard" celebrates its 40th birthday, this tells the story behind its success. Using cast and crew interviews, news footage, snippets from the show, and remarkable footage from Dukes fan celebrations, "Hazzard Nation" is an homage to an American tradition, a family show about a family which fought for the simple values of our nations Heartland. "Hazzard Nation" is forever!
title: Hazzard Nation
